short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to automatically scrape text from websites. All data is automatically saved to a text file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly gather the raw text from a website, and have it automatically parsed and saved to a text file for you. Perfect for developers, or those looking to gather large amounts of real text data efficiently.
